Keywords: Animal , Asgardian , Cosmic , Guardians of the Galaxy
Real Name: Rocket
Special Powers
TOO COLD FOR YOU FUR-LESS WONDERS?: Plasticity. // Opposing characters within 4 squares and line of fire consider Rocket Raccoon adjacent for movement purposes.
WINTER'S COME EARLY FOR YOU!: Energy Explosion. When Rocket Raccoon uses it, after resolutions give each hit character an action token.
WHAT? IT'S JUST A SNOWBALL: Outwit. Once per turn for all characters with this effect, when Rocket Raccoon uses Outwit after resolutions deal the targeted character 1 damage if it has one or more action tokens.

Comments
October 2, 2022
Mystic95
I ran him on a 500pt animal team yesterday and he was my MVP. I paired him with the Wonder Woman Gorilla Grodd and got his attack up to 13 then used Radagast's epic action to move him his full movement for free, them triple targeted my opponents team damaged 3 and gave tokens to 6. Then I outwited one and they took a damage and got ko'd. Only downside is he's only 5 clix deep, other then that he's good.
July 5, 2022
BubbleBuster101
Man teaming this guy up with Prime Captain Mar-Vell can be very frustrating with the amount of tokens given out and the other shenanigans Rocket can pull…

CletusKasadyIII
I just want to say I'm sorry to everyone in future silver age games where I equip this guy with the 008 Cosmic Cube for improved targeting and the Indigo Lantern with shape change to force you to get close to him. I'm not trying to be evil.. it just comes naturally. ;) To complete the theme, I'll play on the old Wundagore map. A nice snow covered mountain my opponent can attempt to climb ever so slowly while I pick them apart! Mwahahaha!
February 18, 2022
Maxphyte
Great figure especially for all that he can do for 50 points. That being said… this figure is also the perfect example of power creep gone wrong.
February 16, 2022
tidge
I certainly would have like some IMPROVED (movement or targeting), and I would have liked a return to tiny size, but this dial is pretty amazing and does a good job representing a clever, annoying character... for a budget cost! Don't forget that those triple-targets work in CLOSE as well.
